snippet.title: ORWELL: IGNORANCE IS STRENGTH – ANNOUNCE TRAILER
snippet.description:
ORWELL: IGNORANCE IS STRENGTH – ANNOUNCE TRAILER

Season two of the award-winning surveillance thriller, Orwell, turns its gaze to explore power and democracy in a post-truth world.

Inspired by the fundamental change happening in the way we consume information today--the rise of fake news, the social media echo chamber and the death of “truth”--Orwell: Ignorance is Strength places the player in the shoes of a government official in a top-secret department of the Orwell program. A political crisis has arisen across borders, threatening to plunge The Nation and Parges into violent civil unrest. 

Given the power to both uncover and fabricate "the truth", the player must decide for themselves how far they will go in the service of their country and whether the truth is sacred or ignorance is strength.

Developed by: Osmotic Studios (Germany)
Platforms: PC, Mac, Linux

Coming soon.

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/633060/Orwell_Ignorance_is_Strength/
Website: http://orwell-ignorance.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/orwell_game


TRAILER PRODUCTION
Trailer created by Derek Lieu
Derek-Lieu.com
@Derek_Lieu

MUSIC
Music by feeding | ear
Represented by The Otherworld Agency.  
http://www.theotherworldagency.com

Hear more by feeding | ear here: http://www.soundcloud.com/feedingear

Orwell Ignorance is Strength soundtrack being released by Boss Battle Records. 
http://www.bossbattlerecords.com


VIDEO AND AUDIO CLIPS

MAIN CLIPS
International Media Support (Good journalism is now more important than ever)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s71R9wmz2Kw

The Obama White House (President Obama Speaks at the White House Correspondents Association Dinner) 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l-5vD5YVLv8

National Press Foundation ("Why Journalism Matters" Winner Liz Medhin)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cViwDi9Ri8A

The National (Media Watch Panel | Is Print Dead?)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-nCLTfV86dE

BBC News (Fake News & Post Truth: How world changed in 2016 - BBC News)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8QVqwNLJb7s

63CAMART (Fake News: ABC Mediawatch 2017 ep01)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cXi5NH341N8

CNN (Trump: We are fighting fake news)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7BY8Qaj22Jg

Democracy Now! (Noam Chomsky on George Orwell, the Suppression of Ideas and the Myth of American Exceptionalism)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Qe4uL8pJuE

Alona Moon (Benjamin Netanyahu at UN Full Speech 9/24/2014)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YyThwJYMtlM

MegaJeremyFisher (Don Lemon & Fareed Zakaria Discuss Donald Trump DISTURBING "ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE" Media Claims)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hP0kqMaayRc

NBC News (Kellyanne Conway: Press Secretary Sean Spicer Gave 'Alternative Facts' | Meet the Press | NBC News)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VSrEEDQgFc8

BBC Newsnight (Donald Trump aide Sebastian Gorka accuses BBC of 'fake news'- BBC Newsnight)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rFK3tbkNX

Good Morning Britain (Nigel Farage Admits NHS Claims Were A Mistake | Good Morning Britain)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cA3XTYfzd1I&t=17s

RT (You are fake news! - Trump blackball's CNNs Acosta)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1IDF-8khS3w

Scott Arthur (Why Post Truth Politics is great for nationalists like UKIP, SNP & Trump)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gXpSN6brGgk

RT (Rise up against Brexit! Tony Blair urges Brits to remain in EU)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EgxRxlSITOo

TEDx Talks (How Fake News Grows in a Post-Fact World - Ali Velshi – TEDxQueensU)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nkAUqQZCyrM

VIDEO WALL
A full list of credits for the video and audio clips can be viewed at surpriseattackgames.com/portfolio-items/orwell-ignorance-is-strength/
